tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlantGrowthPatterns (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(50),
    growth_rate INT,
    ideal_temperature FLOAT,
    last_observation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crop_management_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    decision_type VARCHAR(30),
    decision_date DATE,
    recommendation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    rainfall DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE plant_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name VARCHAR(50),
  growth_stage VARCHAR(20),
  growth_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE field_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(50),
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  area FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE management_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pesticide_name VARCHAR(50),
  pesticide_concentration FLOAT,
  application_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PlantGrowthPatterns (
  plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_type VARCHAR(50),
  growth_date DATE,
  growth_stage INT,
  growth_height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropManagement (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvesting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SoilParameters (
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  soil_type VARCHAR(50),
  acidity_level FLOAT,
  moisture_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmWorkers (
  worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  worker_name VARCHAR(50),
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
)
